panels.description: Complete server resource overview including CPU, Memory, Disk, and Network metrics

targets.expr: sum(time() - node_boot_time_seconds) by (instance, job, server_role, environment, server)
sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes) by (instance, job, server_role, environment, server)
max(node_load5) by (instance, job, server_role, environment, server)
(1 - (sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes) by (instance, job, server_role, environment, server) / sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes) by (instance, job, server_role, environment, server))) * 100
max(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[5m])) by (instance, job, server_role, environment, server)

panels.title: Server Resource Overview
